fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to coach each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The night you coach someone, they will gain a buff of their abilities on the night you coach them depending on what their subalignment is.
- Investigative roles will receive completely accurate results regardless of any attempts to alter the results.
- Protective roles will be able to protect against any type of attack, including Unstoppable and Astral. If your target kills an attacker that performed an attack that they normally could not stop, they will not kill the attacker.
- Killing roles will have their attack value raised to the next-highest value.
- Support roles will have their ability succeed regardless of any other abilities used on them unless it creates a paradox.
- Any subalignment not listed will not receive a buff.
- You will be notified if your coaching is effective.
- Your target will only be notified that they were coached if the coaching is effective.
- You may not coach yourself.
